LanguageData.CreateSimpleProstheticLeg.label: make simple prosthetic leg
LanguageData.CreateSimpleProstheticLeg.description: (Debug version of recipe when swapping from old EPOE to EPOE-forked to avoid workstation glitching. Can keep using as normal.)
LanguageData.CreateSimpleProstheticArm.label: make simple prosthetic arm
LanguageData.CreateSimpleProstheticArm.description: (Debug version of recipe when swapping from old EPOE to EPOE-forked to avoid workstation glitching. Can keep using as normal.)

LanguageData.CreateArtificialPelvis.label: remove this recipe
LanguageData.CreateArtificialPelvis.description: A debug recipe to prevent glitches when swapping from old EPOE to EPOE-forked. Safe to delete this recipe, and you will not see it again. A Simple Rib will be produced as the debugged product of this recipe if continued use.
LanguageData.CreateArtificialClavicle.label: remove this recipe
LanguageData.CreateArtificialClavicle.description: A debug recipe to prevent glitches when swapping from old EPOE to EPOE-forked. Safe to delete this recipe, and you will not see it again. A Simple Rib will be produced as the debugged product of this recipe if continued use.
